toBufferedImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toBufferedImage(java.lang.String s)
Creates a BufferedImage from a given String value.

Parameters:
s - The String that contains image hex data.
Returns:
The BufferedImage that is created from the String of data.

toHexData

public static java.lang.String toHexData(java.io.File f)
Takes in a File and attempts to parse it into a BufferedImage. Then it converts the image into a Byte array to be returned as a String.

Parameters:
f - The file to be parsed into a BufferedImage
Returns:
The String representation of the images hex data.

toElement

public static Element toElement(XMLTag xml)
Takes an XMLTag and attempts to turn the tag into a Element If the XMLTag is not a SetTag then it will give an error message.

Parameters:
xml - The XMLTag to be converted to an Element.
Returns:
The Element that represents the SetTag.

isWhisper

public static boolean isWhisper(java.lang.String sayCmd)
Tells whether the given String conforms to the definition of a whisper.

Parameters:
sayCmd - The String to be examined.
Returns:
True only if the String has a '(' as a first character and ')' as a last character after leading and trailing whitespace is trimmed.

changeToWhisperMessage

public static java.lang.String changeToWhisperMessage(java.lang.String message)
Takes the message as a String and changes it to the proper message for the HearTag.

Parameters:
message - The String message from the CMDTag say.
Returns:
The String with (whisper) added to the front and the name of the Agent it is going to removed.

getToFromWhisper

public static java.lang.String getToFromWhisper(java.lang.String message)
Gets the Agent that the whisper should be sent to.

Parameters:
message - The full String from the say CMDTag.
Returns:
The String of the receiving agents name.
